list.name: WisePOS E
list.sub_title: Smart Reader for hybrid countertop and handheld use.
list.description: Charge customers with a wisepos e stripe terminal card reader

spec.title: Internet enabled
spec.details: Connect your countertop reader via wifi using the large touchscreen.

spec.title: 3rd-party card reader
spec.details: Card readers that are not purchased via this form will NOT work with the app. Card readers purchased directly from Stripe are an exception.

spec.title: Cross-border usage
spec.details: WisePOS E card readers are for Stripe accounts in United Kingdom, Ireland, Canada and the United States. The card readers will NOT function outside of your Stripe account country.

list.name: WisePad 3
list.sub_title: A mobile card reader with a colour display and built-in PIN pad.
list.description: For Stripe accounts based in United Kingdom, Ireland, Australia, Canada, France, Germany, Netherlands and New Zealand

spec.title: Internet enabled
spec.details: Use your mobile devices internet connection to make charges with the WisePad 3.

spec.title: 3rd-party card reader
spec.details: Card readers that are not purchased via this form will NOT work with the app. Card readers purchased directly from Stripe are an exception.

spec.title: Cross-border usage
spec.details: WisePad 3 card readers are for Stripe accounts in United Kingdom, Ireland, Canada and the United States. The card readers will NOT function outside of your Stripe account country.

list.name: Terminal M2
list.description: Seamlessly connect a card reader and charge customers in-person with a card reader.For U.S Stripe accounts, charging in USD only

spec.title: Return Policy
spec.details: Please make sure to read and understand the: Return Policy before completing your purchase. A 20% restocking fee applies for all returns, without exception.

spec.title: 3rd-party card reader
spec.details: Card readers that are not purchased via this form will NOT work with the app. Card readers purchased directly from Stripe are an exception.

spec.title: US/USD only
spec.details: Card readers are for U.S. customers only, when the charge currency is USD. The card readers depend on your physical location, and will not work outside the U.S. until Stripe unlocks them.
